10 #include "calculator/furnace/EfficiencyImprovement.h"

12 double EfficiencyImprovement::getCurrentExcessAir() {
13  this->currentExcessAir_ = (100 * 8.52381 * ((this->currentFlueGasOxygen_)/100))/(2 - 9.52381 *((this->currentFlueGasOxygen_)/100));
14  return this->currentExcessAir_;
15 }
16 
17 double EfficiencyImprovement::getNewExcessAir() {
18  this->newExcessAir_ = (100 * 8.52381 * ((this->newFlueGasOxygen_)/100))/(2 - 9.52381 *((this->newFlueGasOxygen_)/100));
19  return this->newExcessAir_;
20 }
21 
22 double EfficiencyImprovement::getCurrentHeatInput() {
23  this->currentHeatInput_ = 95 + (-0.025) * (this->currentFlueGasTemp_);
24  return this->currentHeatInput_;
25 }
26 
27 double EfficiencyImprovement::getNewHeatInput() {
28  this->newHeatInput_ = 95 + (-0.025) * (this->newFlueGasTemp_);
29  return this->newHeatInput_;
30 }
31 
32 double EfficiencyImprovement::getCurrentAirSpecificHeat(){
33  this->currentAirSpecificHeat_ = 0.017828518 + 0.000002556 * (this->currentCombustionAirTemp_);
34  return this->currentAirSpecificHeat_;
35 }
36 
37 double EfficiencyImprovement::getNewAirSpecificHeat(){
38  this->newAirSpecificHeat_ = 0.017828518 + 0.000002556 * (this->newCombustionAirTemp_);
39  return this->newAirSpecificHeat_;
40 }

42 double EfficiencyImprovement::getCurrentAirCorrection(){
43  double currentExcessAir = getCurrentExcessAir();
44  double currentAirSpecificHeat = getCurrentAirSpecificHeat();
45  this->currentAirCorrection_ = -(-1.07891327 + currentAirSpecificHeat * (this->currentFlueGasTemp_)) * (currentExcessAir/100);
46  return this->currentAirCorrection_;
47 }
48 
49 double EfficiencyImprovement::getNewAirCorrection(){
50  double newExcessAir = getNewExcessAir();
51  double newAirSpecificHeat = getNewAirSpecificHeat();
52  this->newAirCorrection_ = -(-1.07891327 + newAirSpecificHeat * (this->newFlueGasTemp_)) * (newExcessAir/100);
53  return this->newAirCorrection_;
54 }
55 
56 double EfficiencyImprovement::getCurrentCombustionAirCorrection() {
57  double currentAirSpecificHeat = getCurrentAirSpecificHeat();
58  double currentExcessAir = getCurrentExcessAir();
59  this->currentCombustionAirCorrection_ = (-1.078913827 + currentAirSpecificHeat * (this->currentCombustionAirTemp_)) * (1 + (currentExcessAir/100));
60  return this->currentCombustionAirCorrection_;
61 }
62 
63 double EfficiencyImprovement::getNewCombustionAirCorrection() {
64  double newAirSpecificHeat = getNewAirSpecificHeat();
65  double newExcessAir = getNewExcessAir();
66  this->newCombustionAirCorrection_ = (-1.078913827 + newAirSpecificHeat * (this->newCombustionAirTemp_)) * (1 + (newExcessAir/100));
67  return this->newCombustionAirCorrection_;
68 }
69 
70 double EfficiencyImprovement::getCurrentAvailableHeat(){
71  double currentHeatInput = getCurrentHeatInput();
72  double currentAirCorrection = getCurrentAirCorrection();
73  double currentCombustionAirCorrection = getCurrentCombustionAirCorrection();
74  this->currentAvailableHeat_ = currentHeatInput + currentAirCorrection + currentCombustionAirCorrection;
75  return this->currentAvailableHeat_;
76 }
77 
78 double EfficiencyImprovement::getNewAvailableHeat(){
79  double newHeatInput = getNewHeatInput();
80  double newAirCorrection = getNewAirCorrection();
81  double newCombustionAirCorrection = getNewCombustionAirCorrection();
82  this->newAvailableHeat_ = newHeatInput + newAirCorrection + newCombustionAirCorrection;
83  return this->newAvailableHeat_;
84 }
85 
86 
87 double EfficiencyImprovement::getNewFuelSavings() {
88  double newAvailableHeat = getNewAvailableHeat();
89  double currentAvailableHeat = getCurrentAvailableHeat();
90  this->newFuelSavings_ = ((newAvailableHeat - currentAvailableHeat) / newAvailableHeat) * 100;
91  return this->newFuelSavings_;
92 }
93 
94 double EfficiencyImprovement::getNewEnergyInput(){
95  double newFuelSavings = getNewFuelSavings();
96  this->newEnergyInput_ = (this->currentEnergyInput_) * (1 - newFuelSavings/100);
97  return this->newEnergyInput_;
98 }
